sn23:1.1.2: Atha kho āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:1.2.3: “Rūpe kho, rādha, sati māro vā assa māretā vā yo vā pana mīyati.
sn23:1.2.4: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, rādha, rūpaṃ māroti passa, māretāti passa, mīyatīti passa, rogoti passa, gaṇḍoti passa, sallanti passa, aghanti passa, aghabhūtanti passa.
sn23:1.2.5: Ye naṃ evaṃ passanti te sammā passanti.
sn23:1.2.9: viññāṇe sati māro vā assa māretā vā yo vā pana mīyati.
sn23:1.2.10: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, rādha, viññāṇaṃ māroti passa, māretāti passa, mīyatīti passa, rogoti passa, gaṇḍoti passa, sallanti passa, aghanti passa, aghabhūtanti passa.
sn23:1.2.11: Ye naṃ evaṃ passanti, te sammā passantī”ti.
sn23:1.3.10: “Accayāsi, rādha, pañhaṃ, nāsakkhi pañhassa pariyantaṃ gahetuṃ.
sn23:1.3.11: Nibbānogadhañhi, rādha, brahmacariyaṃ vussati, nibbānaparāyanaṃ nibbānapariyosānan”ti.
sn23:2.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:2.1.4: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sattoti vuccatī”ti?
sn23:2.1.5: “Rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasmā sattoti vuccati.
sn23:2.1.9: viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasmā sattoti vuccati.
sn23:2.2.1: Seyyathāpi, rādha, kumārakā vā kumārikāyo vā paṃsvāgārakehi kīḷanti.
sn23:2.2.2: Yāvakīvañca tesu paṃsvāgārakesu avigatarāgā honti avigatacchandā avigatapemā avigatapipāsā avigatapariḷāhā avigatataṇhā, tāva tāni paṃsvāgārakāni allīyanti keḷāyanti dhanāyanti mamāyanti.
sn23:2.2.3: Yato ca kho, rādha, kumārakā vā kumārikāyo vā tesu paṃsvāgārakesu vigatarāgā honti vigatacchandā vigatapemā vigatapipāsā vigatapariḷāhā vigatataṇhā, atha kho tāni paṃsvāgārakāni hatthehi ca pādehi ca vikiranti vidhamanti viddhaṃsenti vikīḷaniyaṃ karonti.
sn23:2.2.4: Evameva kho, rādha, tumhepi rūpaṃ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṃsetha vikīḷaniyaṃ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
sn23:2.2.5: Vedanaṃ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṃsetha vikīḷaniyaṃ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
sn23:2.2.7: saṅkhāre vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṃsetha vikīḷaniyaṃ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
sn23:2.2.8: Viññāṇaṃ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṃsetha vikīḷaniyaṃ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
sn23:3.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:3.1.4: Katamā nu kho, bhante, bhavanetti, katamo bhavanettinirodho”ti?
sn23:3.1.5: “Rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā—
sn23:4.1.2: Āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:4.2.1: “Pariññeyye ca, rādha, dhamme desessāmi pariññañca pariññātāviṃ puggalañca.
sn23:4.2.2: Taṃ suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn23:4.2.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā rādho bhagavato paccassosi.
sn23:4.2.6: Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, pariññeyyo dhammo, vedanā pariññeyyo dhammo, saññā pariññeyyo dhammo, saṅkhārā pariññeyyo dhammo, viññāṇaṃ pariññeyyo dhammo.
sn23:4.2.9: Yo kho, rādha, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
sn23:5.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:5.1.6: Ye hi keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti;
sn23:5.1.7: na me te, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā, na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṃ vā brahmaññatthaṃ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
sn23:5.1.8: Ye ca kho keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti;
sn23:5.1.9: te kho me, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā, te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn23:6.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:6.1.6: Ye hi keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti …pe…
sn23:7.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:7.1.6: Yato kho, rādha, ariyasāvako imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti—
sn23:7.1.7: ayaṃ vuccati, rādha, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn23:8.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:8.1.6: Yato kho, rādha, bhikkhu imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā anupādāvimutto hoti—
sn23:8.1.7: ayaṃ vuccati, rādha, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto”ti.
sn23:9.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:9.1.3: “rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha.
sn23:9.1.4: Evaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
sn23:9.1.5: Vedanāya yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha.
sn23:9.1.6: Evaṃ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn23:9.1.8: saṅkhāresu yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha.
sn23:9.1.9: Evaṃ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn23:9.1.10: Viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha.
sn23:9.1.11: Evaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati …pe… anuppādadhamman”ti.
sn23:10.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:10.1.3: “rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
sn23:10.1.4: Evaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
sn23:10.1.5: Vedanāya yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
sn23:10.1.6: Evaṃ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn23:10.1.8: saṅkhāresu yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
sn23:10.1.9: Evaṃ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn23:10.1.10: Viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
sn23:10.1.11: Evaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhamman”ti.
sn23:11.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:11.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, māro, vedanā māro, saññā māro, saṅkhārā māro, viññāṇaṃ māro.
sn23:11.1.6: Evaṃ passaṃ, rādha, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn23:11.1.7: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn23:11.1.8: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn23:12.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:12.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, māradhammo, vedanā māradhammo, saññā māradhammo, saṅkhārā māradhammo, viññāṇaṃ māradhammo.
sn23:13.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:13.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ, vedanā aniccā, saññā aniccā, saṅkhārā aniccā, viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ.
sn23:14.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:14.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, aniccadhammo, vedanā aniccadhammo, saññā aniccadhammo, saṅkhārā aniccadhammo, viññāṇaṃ aniccadhammo.
sn23:15.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:15.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, dukkhaṃ, vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ.
sn23:16.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:16.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, dukkhadhammo, vedanā dukkhadhammo, saññā dukkhadhammo, saṅkhārā dukkhadhammo, viññāṇaṃ dukkhadhammo.
sn23:17.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:17.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṃ anattā.
sn23:18.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:18.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, anattadhammo, vedanā anattadhammo, saññā anattadhammo, saṅkhārā anattadhammo, viññāṇaṃ anattadhammo.
sn23:19.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:19.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, khayadhammo, vedanā khayadhammo, saññā khayadhammo, saṅkhārā khayadhammo, viññāṇaṃ khayadhammo.
sn23:20.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:20.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, vayadhammo, vedanā vayadhammo, saññā vayadhammo, saṅkhārā vayadhammo, viññāṇaṃ vayadhammo.
sn23:21.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:21.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, samudayadhammo, vedanā samudayadhammo, saññā samudayadhammo, saṅkhārā samudayadhammo, viññāṇaṃ samudayadhammo.
sn23:22.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:22.1.5: “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo, vedanā nirodhadhammo, saññā nirodhadhammo, saṅkhārā nirodhadhammo, viññāṇaṃ nirodhadhammo.
sn23:23.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn23:23.1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn23:23.2.1: “Yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23:23.2.3: Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23:23.2.4: Vedanā māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:23.2.5: saññā māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:23.2.6: saṅkhārā māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:23.2.7: viññāṇaṃ māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:23.2.8: yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn23:24.1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, māradhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe…. (2)
sn23:33.1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, samudayadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe…. (11)
sn23:34.1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn23:34.2.1: “Yo kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23:34.2.3: Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:34.2.4: vedanā nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:34.2.5: saññā nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:34.2.6: saṅkhārā nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:34.2.7: viññāṇaṃ nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:34.2.8: yo kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn23:35.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:35.1.3: “yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23:35.1.5: Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:35.1.6: viññāṇaṃ māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23:35.1.7: yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn23:36.1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, māradhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe…. (2)
sn23:45.1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, samudayadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe…. (11)
sn23:46.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23:46.1.3: “yo kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23:46.1.5: Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23:46.1.9: viññāṇaṃ nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23:46.1.10: Yo kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
